post.body: yes - you're next on my list. Calling you now :)
sorry for omitting you guys - 140 characters and 9 WebMission startups aren't really compatible!
@amanda mentioned you're looking for a venue in Oxford - email me on davidatgroupspacesdotcom with details if you need a hand.
@nivi from @venturehacks rates Bargaining for Advantage (http://is.gd/cRfX) - near the top of my current list of books to read
new profile pic is very cool.
I use Cafe Rouge or The Oxford Retreat - no private rooms but quiet with good atmosphere.
happy birthday!
can you bring my shirt you picked up in Paris to the gym tomorrow?
Econsultancy interview with @mbites - GroupSpaces mentioned as one of the startups really standing out in the UK: http://is.gd/cXNK
heading out in Clapham Junction with old friends.
RT @joshuamarch Woot! Techfluff.tv featured on http://techcrunch.com - cheers @mbites
on Oxford Tube heading to London for 2 birthday parties with @anjool and the AlphaParties crew: first to Mike Kay's, then @rajdey's
RT @tewy just did an interview for Channel 4 news - watch it tonight at 6.30pm!
"You make habit, then habit makes you." ... "Failing to plan is planning to fail." Lots of reflection and growth coming up over Xmas period.
loving WAYN's Christmas greeting - good work @m4rta & co: http://is.gd/cybr
lots of party food at office Christmas lunch. Now answering last few important emails before hitting the pub with the team.
RT @OliBarrett: "Soled!" @tewy's 'Sock and Awe' website www.sockandawe.com sells for 5,215 pounds on Ebay http://tinyurl.com/4lopot
dinner in Yo Sushi! Chilling with zen music and green tea before hitting things hard again later.
RT @jemimakiss: LinkedIn founder Reid Hoffman reassumes chief exec post http://tinyurl.com/3n3tt8
Shel Israel interviews @mbites for @1938media in Balans, Soho: http://bit.ly/HVXJ
